page.title: 17SOCIAL SERVICES LETTER
page.content: {THIS IS AN EXTRACT FROM A LETTER IN {THE RIDGE CHURCH PARISH MAGASINE}THE SOCIAL SERVICES DEPARTMENT ARE PRESENTLY IN NEED OF FOSTER HOMES FOR SCHOOL AGE CHILDREN,AND IN PARTICULAR FOR THE 11+ AGE GROUPS.FOSTERING A CHILD IS A BIG STEP TO TAKE BUT CANBE A REALLY REWARDING AND STIMULATING EXPERIENCE.CARING FOR "SOMEONE ELSES CHILD"REQUIRES WARMTH,PATIENCE TOLER ENCE AND ABOVE ALL AN ACCEPTANCE OF THE CHILD AS HE IS,GOOD OR BAD.THERE WILL BE PROBLEMS TO FACE AND OVERCOME, MOMENTS OF GREAT JOY AND SOMETIMESA FEW TEARS.THE CHILDREN WHO COME INTO OUR CARE HAVE MANY NEEDS.THEY JUST MIGHT WANT"TIME OUT "FROM THEIR OWN FAMILES,PERHAPS A HELPING HAND TOWARDS INDEPENENT LIVING OR ULTIMATELY A CHANCE TO START THEIR LIVES AGAIN WITHIN A PERMANENT CARING HOME,AND SO LEAVE THEIR TRAGIC PASTS BEHIND THEM
